languages.text: This creature inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Toxin: at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Совершая атаки в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, существо накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}. Отравление: каждый раз в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цель совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. При успехе эффект снимается, а при провале цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This creature inflicts toxin with their melee attacks. Toxin: At the start of every turn the affected target makes a Toughness resistance test to remove this effect on succes or suffer damage on fail.
This creature inflicts toxin with their melee attacks. Toxin: at the start of every turn, the affected target must pass a Toughness resistance test to remove this effect or suffer damage.

This creature inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Toxin: at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

This creature inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Toxin: at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: 此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}会造成{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。 毒素：每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受影响的目标必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}才能移除此效果，否则会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: This creature inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Toxin: at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}近战攻击{/g}会造成毒素伤害。 毒素：每个回合开始时，受影响的目标必须通过坚韧抗性检定才能移除此效果，否则会受到{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。

languages.text: Esta criatura inflige {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} con sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. Toxina: al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el objetivo afectado debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} para eliminar este efecto o sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daños{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Toxin: at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura inflige toxina con sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. Toxina: al principio de cada turno, el objetivo afectado debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia para eliminar este efecto o sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daños{/g}.

languages.text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を付与する。 毒：毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、毒が付与されたターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わない、成功すれば解除できる。失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: This creature inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Toxin: at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}近接攻撃{/g}で毒を付与する。 毒：毎ターン開始時、毒が付与されたターゲットはタフネス抵抗判定を行わない、成功すれば解除できる。失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Совершая атаки в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, существо накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}. Отравление: каждый раз в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цель совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. При успехе эффект снимается, а при провале цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Toxin: at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}атаки в ближнем бою{/g}, существо накладывает отравление. Отравление: каждый раз в начале своего хода цель совершает проверку Выносливости на сопротивление. При успехе эффект снимается, а при провале цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g}.

Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}атаки в ближнем бою{/g}, существо накладывает отравление. Отравление: каждый раз в начале своего хода цель совершает проверку Выносливости на сопротивление. При успехе эффект снимается, а при провале цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur verursacht mit ihren {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}. Toxin: Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} muss das betroffene Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} schaffen, um diesen Effekt zu entfernen und keinen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu erleiden.
languages.original_text: This creature inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Toxin: at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur fügt mit ihren {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}Nahkampfangriffen{/g} Toxin zu. Toxin: Zu Beginn jedes Zuges muss das betroffene Ziel eine Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit schaffen, um diesen Effekt zu entfernen, oder es erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g}.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} de cette créature infligent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}. Toxine : au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, la cible frappée par cet effet doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} pour s'en débarrasser, faute de quoi elle subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Toxin: at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}attaques de mêlée{/g} de cette créature infligent l'effet Toxine. Toxine : au début de chaque tour, la cible frappée par cet effet doit réussir un test lié à la Résistance pour s'en débarrasser, faute de quoi elle subit des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g}.
